name: Kaycee Zarske
text: Nice people. Very friendly. We felt very welcome there and enjoyed Easter Sunday service.

resp.text: Thank you so much for that kind review. So glad you enjoyed the service. Come back anytime!

text: Awesome church all the way around!! They have a great kids ministry! When you walk in there is people there to open the door and greet you! The pastor preaches where it’s understandable!! Love this church!!!

name: Casey Havard Young
text: The River is a  Wonderful place for our youth community. Wednesday night is always a treat for teens and younger to go for good clean fun!! Love love this place.

name: Sue Wilson
text: Wonderful church, the people are warm and inviting. The Pastor speaks straight from the Word of God, worship team is incredible!

name: proprgal
text:
If you are looking for a church to call home you must visit "The River".  You feel like you are with family from the time you walk in until you leave.

Glory to God, He is good.

name: keshatillery
text: Oh my gosh what a service. The music was outstanding. Pastor amazing.  Friends come join us

name: william smith
text: I've never been here just drove by it 1000 times.Ive always been told it's basically a hang out for teenagers.(Christian environment)for kids as an alternative to running the streets drunk or on drugs,sounds like a great idea.more people should come here if it's working

name: Ashley Seaman
text: Love this church! So friendly and welcoming!

name: Princess Adams
text: Love my Church ❤️

text: Went for a halloween event.

name: Bertist 'Tim' Rouse
text: I went there to vote.

name: Rafael M
text: Ok

name: J Walters
text: Fantastic people at such a great place. Really the best church I've been to in the entire local area. They really make you feel at home there

name: Daniel Heller
text: It's a non-denominational church that welcomes all visitors and has a powerful message and an awesome worship team and God is really anointed them with the power of the Holy Spirit

name: Natalie Isbell
text: I love my church!

name: Angela Townsend
text: I love this church. Great for families, young adults, and anyone. Experience God's love and true acceptance with a casual atmosphere.

name: Brenda W. Powell
text: This is a wonderful church very committed to sharing the gospel and taking care of the needy in our community and worldwide! Pastor Norm teaches the Word in truth and love and in a way people can understand and apply to their own lives. Pastor Norm and Liz truly love people right where they are. We are blessed to have such a church in Guntersville, Alabama.

name: Heather Maples
text: My family and I went to RealChurch in search of a place that makes you feel like family and not just another number.  When we walked in, there was such a peace and love that we felt immediately, followed by lots of hugs and smiles!  The worship is up-to-date and spirit filled, you can't help but feel God's presence.  Pastor Norm always delivers his message in a way that is easy to understand and not to make you feel preached at.  THEN, the kids ministry.... let me just say WOW!!  From infants to teens, there is a lesson and message given in an exciting and fun way that the children can't wait to come back each week!  If you're looking for a church to call HOME, come check it out.  RealChurch does not disappoint!

name: Christian Gu
text: Real church is really good I have been going there for the last 3 years if you do not have a home church already. try real Church

name: Sharon Leinna carden wilbanks
text:
Love this church.a place u  can go no one will judge you,but help pick u up.always there for u & love everyone.come as u are.we all love u all  for who u are
Come join us on Sundays. Bro Norm & sister Liz are awesome and everyone there.

name: Daniel Watwood
text: Very good church love going there great people

name: Gary Morrison II
text: It's an awesome place

name: Eli Parker
text: It’s in fact, a real church

name: Debora Hernandez
text: Love this church

name: Shanika Ogburn
text:
This church is truly awesome! I felt the Holy Spirit the moment I stepped in. I heard of the church after enrolling my daughter in their summer camp and private school. I'm so excited for her to be a part of the school where God and academia are both very important. I was thrilled to see that what I saw in the church is the same thing I saw in the school. The people are loving and welcoming, and aren't afraid to show their love for God. If you visit this church feeling heavy and leave the same way, you missed something! I know because I moved here to Alabama at the worst time of my life and I felt encouragement and the joy of God just from two visits. Try it for yourself! I'll definitely be returning.
Also, they have children's church!

name: Janet Faustmann
text: The Pastors of this church truly love God and love people. They teach the Bible. The true word of God.   The Pastors and members here   care for each other and care for the local community.  That love, care, and sharing of Jesus is also carried into other countries of the world.    My family and I are truly blessed to be a part of this church.

name: Sandra Webber
text: I have been a member since 2012.  If you want to learn more about getting closer to God, come here.  The music is fantastic and the pastors are great.  They teach things that you can relate to and definitely apply to your every day life.

name: Sammie Laster
text: The pillars of Worshipping Jesus and Declaring His Word (over your own life as well as the lives of others) is foundational here.  If you want the "Good Food" of God's Word while enjoying His Presence....come visit AND stay!

name: Samantha Bagwell
text: If you want to hear the true word of God, look no further. If you want to be among believers who love God, look no further. This is a great church and a great family.

name: Jennifer Berisford
text: We love the genuine heart of the pastors as well as the involvement in local and world missions.   Fantastic children's miniseries, and freedom to choose from multiple small groups of all kinds.

name: Diana Hase
text: Valley is not just a great church.  It's our family!  Come worship with us and experience the tangible transforming love of Jesus,  the manifest presence of the Holy Spirit bringing peace and healing, the power of God the  Father sustaining  and keeping us and giving hope .

name: Heather Killinger
text: Valley Fellowship has been a blessing to my family. It's a safe place for families to go to share their lives together. I would absolutely recommend to all of my friends.

name: Amanda Woodson
text: Come be a part of a church that welcomes you like family. With a heart for missions, Christian Education and a love for people, Valley Fellowship is a true blessing to Huntsville Alabama.

name: Emerson Bradley
text: Someone had told us about Valley Fellowship Church so we went to visit.  It was like a light had been turned on.  We had never seen worship like that before and the prayer and ministry was just amazing.

name: Bernadette Thomas
text: I've been coming here for decades, even before the current pastor was there, but I joined the night that I first heard them preach there. They were so good I wanted to be a permanent part of that.

name: Sam Hobsin
text: I love the ministry here. It speaks right to me and hits on a personal level.

name: Harry Ronstead
text: I have been attending Valley Fellowship Church for about 9 years now.  They have excellent ministry to meet individual needs of others.  I would highly recommend them to friends and family, and have.

name: Margaret Peters
text: You cannot find a pastor with more integrity. This place just has something special about it that I love.

name: Wesley Church
text: There's a great group of people at Valley Fellowship! Great praise and worship

name: Cara Goodwin
text: Valley Fellowship Church has been my home church for the last 29 years.  I have found family here that has nothing to do with blood.  We have lived here together, through weddings, births, funerals and everything in between.

name: Alison Harvey
text: They truly care about salvation. They want people to live with God in all ways.

name: Chris Brown
text: Valley Fellowship Church is closer than family to me!

name: GinCole
text: If you want a down to earth church home, that will welcome you with open arms, then come visit us here at FCC!

resp.text: Thanks, Gina! We’re glad to have you and your family with us!

text: Statements made by the receptionist who facilitated the tour, we're insulting and personally hurtful. Her visual observations should be kept to herself and shared with the staff as need to knows for the betterment of my child versus choosing to use an open forum of the admitting office in front of others. Not to mention her observation is not valued or wanted, seeing that she does not hold not one certification in childcare development.

text: This is an Awesome Place... had my grandchildren Birthday Party at  Xtreme Kidz it was Amazing!!! The staff was very friendly , courteous and organized, the food was great and the kids had a GREAT time. From start to finish there was not a need that wasn't met with the  utmost kindness.

name: Nathan Brown
text: First time visiting today. What a great church! I knew Church of the Highlands was a great place but the West Bham take with pastor Mayo was next level.  I don’t live in Birmingham anymore but if I did, this would be my church!

name: Rebecca Padin
text: Spirit filled church with loving people

name: Bible Study Anywhere and Everywhere
text: Nice comfortable facilities

name: gladys Zimmerman
text: I have attended TCOTH (West Bham) Campus for over a year and finding it very "Refreshing" an exciting atmosphere of Worship, love, praise. I highly recommend it to friends and family.

name: Cheryl Henderson
text: Too loud and theatrical for me. I went to the one at Parker High School. A well oiled machine. I can see the appeal. The loud concert atmosphere, visuals and sing alongs. Bible references were thrown out but not dwelled on and said so quickly you couldn't write them down to refer to later when rewinding the message in your head later. Wonder if all sited have the loud speakers booming towards the parking lot.

name: Janice King
text: I love this church...

name: Henry Lyles
text: COTH continue to allow God to use you

name: Sheborah York
text: Love Keith and family. Enjoyed service

name: Tureene Arevalo
text: Love this Church and the people are feeling more like family everytime I go. I need to get more involved. If you're like me and you are healing from a controlling religion, and you need a place where the people are genuine, and you can be real, this is the place. If you need a place to "do" or "go" in your calling,  this is the family for you. You will find support from the Pastor and the partners in what God has called you to do.

name: Greg Patrick
text: The people are very warm & welcoming.  The worship is very moving & God honoring. The preaching is very biblical & life applicable.  This is a must visit Church.

name: Fannie Stockdale
text: Praised the Lord

name: Brandon Coffey
text: I have been working on a remodel of this church. The non-denominational part is extremely interesting. They also provided the bible as well a more modern study along version for us in the construction area. This has been really good information. I have enjoyed the side by side comparison!

name: Jimmy Albright
text:
Desperation Church is amazing, Pastor Andy and the other campus Pastors do a phenomenal job, not only in delivering the message and preaching the gospel, but also leading the Church out into the communities helping those in need. They dont just preach it, they lead by example demonstrating it! No matter what you've done or been through, there's no judgement, just love and welcoming. You belong here! I'm from Deatsville, Alabama and I've been to many churches but, Desperation is different............don't just take my word for it, come see for yourself!

WELCOME HOME!

name: ZAC CREEL
text: Great place to worship. If you haven't been to a service before, you must check it out. The pastor is amazing. This church is differently growing and expanding it's reach to spread out across the surrounding communities, and that is the power of GOD at work.

name: Terry Nabors
text: Me and my fieance' have been going a little over a month and absolutely love the atmosphere,  the people treat us like family. Thats what all churches should feel like, as long as there are victories in Christ along with fellowship.My prayer is that some of my friends will meet us there one day and experience the peace, joy and love we both have. Everyone have a blessed day no matter what church you are apart of love in Christ Happy hippie Christian truckers travels.

name: Suzy Lynn
text: Nice people. No follow up by anyone with the church or community groups, though. Disappointed.

name: Joseph Brown
text: Searching for a church home? Look here! Amazing experience! Pastor Andy is outstanding! Try it out online first if you're uncertain. This place changes lives and communities.

name: Luis Lopez
text: Great church.Very good Pastor.Great services. Music very good but a bit loud. A+++++

name: Katrina Davenport
text: The people are so sweet, pastor is very dedicated and earnest,  music is awesome and entertaining, people in nursery is so good with the kids I love this church.

name: James Buchanan
text: This is by far the best church iv been too they've helped me rebuild my relationship with Jesus and the pastor is amazing

name: Brian Ramsey
text: Kingdom building church. Following Jesus and being the church for God.

name: Adam West
text: Love the heart of this church and their staff. They are changing lives one person at a time. If you need a church home in the Cullman are, you have to try Desperation.

name: Donna Ligon
text: Felt the welcoming Spirit at Cullman  and Jasper locations!  Will be back!

text: Excelente place of WORSHIP

name: Connie Sparman
text: Went there to give blood

name: Bonnie Newman
text: Like going home

name: Elle Johnson
text: Not an official member but it is the church I attended pre COVID-19 and pay my tithes to. Pastor Mark and Pastor Rhonda are phenomenal teachers of the word. If you wish for a diverse congregation of inclusion of the human race then this is your place. If you only want to see other people who look exactly like you then may be not so much.

name: Kim Dillon
text: Great teaching to help you overcome in life; great worship, too.

name: CGL Phattimus_Prime
text: This is the best place for worship. They teach only God's Word and  Pastor Mark and Pastor Rhonda are the best. Within this congregation you will meet some of the best people you've ever met in your life. That is a guarantee.

name: Alyssa Rose
text: Great atmosphere!! Can always come with an expectation to receive from God! Very welcoming

name: HMCR 3986
text: Great church with a small church atmosphere.  You will feel welcomed and greeted  by many very warmly.  Even those who are not greeters reach out to you to welcome you.  The worship service is uplifting beginning with the worship leaders call to worship.  He begins by speaking of who the Bible says God is and what He does for us.  You cannot help but worship after you listen to him.  The current sermon series is on loving God, loving others and being understanding on how much God loves us and the World that he created and sent Jesus to bring back into relationship with him.

name: Sharon Colburn
text: My home church family. Love it!

name: Ashley Masoner
text: Pastor Mark preaches directly from the Word, he is filled with the Holy Spirit. He offers Greek and Hebrew translations to keep us in context, never straying from God's magnificent truth. This church and church family has changed my life- I am utterly in love. Everyone is welcome, loved and attended to like family. His wife, Pastor Rhonda, is spirit-filled as well and they both travel abroad occasionally for missions and outreach. They have a heart for ALL nations and ALL people. Since attending this church for only 9 months now, my huband and I have become full of the Holy Spirit and we walk with our Lord on a daily basis. It has truly changed our lives and we have been blessed ever since reaching out to God for that close relationship God longs for. Come see us!!

name: Pamela Helton
text: Great church. The real deal.

name: Tina Hinze
text: Love my church. Non denominational christian with over 19 nationalities.

name: Sophia Colquiett

text: I absolutely love this church! It's a church that really loves people where they're at! Since the first time I walked in the door I have felt welcomed, it really does feel like home!

text: I have never had a home church. I am so thankful to have found Lakehills. You can see the love of Jesus in each sermon.

text: Love the Pastor!! He always preaches a personal sermon without making you feel  singled out.  Love the feeling at the church! The people are great!!

name: Jerry Mardant
text: Been going there 6years I believe that it has been the Best Church I have ever attend in the 30 years I've been going

text: A place full of hope and love for all...

name: Justin Trull
text: Awesome Pastor.

name: Mike West
text: Bring your pieces,  stay a while and become complete

name: Jo Anne Tingle
text:
I can't tell you how much this place blessed our lives on Sunday!!! We were looking for a small, contemporary church that was COVID friendly but not over the top, and GOD truly led us here!

Pastor Fine's message was clear, concise and for EVERYONE!!! The Praise and Worship was just fantastic! Everyone was so friendly. I just can't  say enough! We were just a family passing through Prattville, drifters; but they made us feel like "family" from the minute we walked in.

name: Hoyt Middleton
text: Friendly staff willing to pray with you

name: Clifford Chatman
text: It was very beautiful

resp.text: Thank you for coming and being a part of our service!  God bless you.

name: B. Morgan
text: Nice people, nice pastor.

name: Debi Goodman
text: An incredibly friendly church that preaches truth straight from the Bible, accepts imperfect people, could care less about how much money you have or what you wear. There are people of all ages. Some have been in church since birth and some may be starting a new chapter of sobriety and discovering that God loves you where you are. Doesn't seem to be any sort of dress code, you don't have to own a bible because they put the verses on screens at the front and in the program you get at the door. They're at the corner of 82 and 14 just past the paper mill and next to Family Dollar. It was a warehouse they bought and are renovating. Handicap accessible and plenty of parking behind as well as handicap spots near entrances and drop off areas. Great contemporary music and a preacher who is real and approachable.

name: David Hopper
text: Well you can really see and feel the love and compasion from the preacher..

name: Olivia Oneal
text: Nice building many rooms for various needs.

name: Jeremy Grant
text: Love seasons

name: Lynn Ferrell
text: Building Church help others to feel God’s love and understand how to apply God’s Word to your life. You are welcomed here and members walk alongside you through life. ❤️❤️

name: David Bezerra
text:
Absolutely awesome. I had a great worship tine here and will be back for more services. People were friendly but not too friendly where it becames fake.
Worship team was very involving and showed they took the service seriously

name: Katelyn Miller
text: so awesome!!! everybody is so friendly and such a family! welcome all ages, denominations, cultures, and everybody! i was afraid it wasn't the church i would feel at home at when i drove up. But let me tell you. once i walked into that service i was crying big tears because i knew that was it for me. the atmosphere, people, worship, sermon, and everything else there was it for me.

name: Jessie Zucnick
text: Very welcoming,  friendly church that encourages all races and backgrounds to come together as one to serve God and the community.

name: Brooks Hamer
text: First time visiting and it felt like home from the moment I walked in. Friendly people. Great music and awesome service!! 🙏🏼

name: Heather Conigliaro
text: You truly feel blessed as soon as you walk inside of the Church .The entire Church Family are kind, loving ,and are not judgemental!! Everyone is willing to answer any questions and help in  anyway.  I have found exactly where God wants me to be! Thank you , Building Church!

name: Dean Lance
text: This may come our home of worship

name: Ron Thomas
text: If you take anything away from this review, let it be this: If you do not feel welcome at this church than I would be totally surprised.   My family and myself moved to Madison from out of state and wanted to find a church we would all fit into and enjoy.  From the very first time we visited Building Church, we were warmly welcomed by several people and had people talk to us and genuinely care about us.  If you've been looking for a church, never been to church, weirded out by church, hurt by a church, come try Building Church.  YOU are welcomed to come. Just try it. Please try it. See you there!

name: Paul Gilcrease
text: Absolutely, wonderful church. From the time you walk in the door you feel like you are home.

name: Alabama Reloader
text: This church is awesome! Everyone is so friendly and the messages are powerful! Check it out, you won't be disappointed.

name: Tammie Brown
text: If you are looking for a place that has you in mind, look no further. Building Church is building lives.

name: ryane goyette
text: I'm going to this church for over 6 months and had a rough spell this month and when I asked for help begging and pleading like a dog asking for table scraps I was stuck outside in the cold like a dog remind you I don't in any way believethe church is obligated to do anything for anyone this is America you do for yourself but when a churchpromote help and healing and ignores you when you asked her help I do have a problem with that on top of that every single Sunday that we self-esteem give our money to the church I think the very least they're so many people who can use just a little bit of help and went to church turns their back on the people it's not church I would be a part of terrible absolutely awful and going through with that you should be ashamed of yourselves

name: Scott Brodeur
text: A welcoming, Christ filled, body of believers. We Love belonging to the Building Church family!

name: Jake Rebello
text: This place is always going to be home to me. Welcoming atmosphere with an open heart for jesus

name: CrownedSoV
text: Everyone is so friendly here  I immediately felt at home!

name: Shaston Hunter
text: Being connected to this body of believers has totally shifted my entire life! Thankful for genuine people at Building Church!

name: daphne abellon
text: I love the spiritual family I have here too!

name: Julia Houser
text: Building Church is HOME!!! Everyone is so kind and welcoming & Pastor Spencer and Mrs. Ellen are awesome!!

name: Danny Turner
text: This is my home church in Huntsville. I can't say enough good things about the place

name: Vanessa Pichon
text: This is a wonderful church!!

name: laura king
text: Great place to worship!!!

name: Sid Wing
text: Come here! Join the family!

name: Brittany Haggerty
text: Love it

resp.text: Brittany, Thank you for the 5 Star review!   We are glad you had a great experience.

name: Shea Jay
text: Very Welcoming Church!!

name: David Williams
text: Was invited to a limited opening during the covid pandemic. The people were very friendly,  and the message was great. The music was fantastic! Can't wait for church to open up full capacity.

name: Gregorio Santana
text: I've been a member of Ridge now four years . I'm a Traveller but this is my home church. Trip our pastor is amazing and our members are too. This church has reshaped my life all around to be the best I can be. Thank you ridge for the lessons but most of always being family. Love y'all

name: Debi Dean
text: Our family loves worshiping and serving at Ridge!  The way these people love on others and reach out to both believers and those who are searching is beautiful.  We're so blessed to be a part of Ridge and are looking forward to seeing where God takes this church next!

name: Brandi Myrick
text: My family loves serving and being a part of Ridge Church. This church loves the people of Elmore County and the surrounding area. They want More For You! I highly recommend visiting Ridge Church.

name: Amy Willis
text: My husband and I started attending Ridge Church the day they re-launched at the Wetumpka High School. We felt welcomed from the moment we pulled in the parking lot. Ridge has a great team of leaders, their families included. Worship team is amazing. We have found OUR church.

name: vanessa rhodes
text: I have loved Ridge Church since I walked in the doors a year and 3 months ago. The people are amazing and accept you as you are. We are super excited for relaunch. I know God has big plans for our church.

name: Eva Taylor
text: When you visit and find yourself feeling that you are a part of a bigger family, where  you are  able to grow in your relationship with Christ,  when you have a prayer request, and know it  will be prayed for, when you need encouragement, and know where to find it..you have found Ridge Church! Loves all ages, reaches out to the community, supports missions, and loves your family..this just might be the church for you! It was and still is for my family.

name: Katie Campbell
text: Ridge Church is so special to our family. We love this church and the many people we get to serve with each week! God is doing amazing things through the people of this church and we are more than thankful to be a part of it!

name: Laura Adams
text: My kids love going to Ridge Kids, and we love the friendly, casual atmosphere. Great music, and sermons that give you hope.

name: Lindsey Sanford
text: My family and I love serving at Ridge Church! The message is always rooted in scripture and the people are so friendly and genuine!

name: Crystal Collins (Crystal)
text: We love Ridge Church!  I love how they love people regardless of past faults or even current situations.

name: Jeremy Moncrief
text: Awesome message,music.  Authentic love from an amazing church

name: Milissa Gainey
text: I loved this church, I was sad when I moved to church. They were, nice, welcoming and treated us like family.

name: Trip Healey
text: We had no idea the impact Ridge Church would not only have on this community, but also on our family when we launched in September of 2013.  We have moved to Wetumpka High School on Sundays at 9 & 10:30am!

name: 李心
text: Love this church so much!  Even make me wanna move to USA!

name: Anita Barrett
text: We have been serving in the nursery almost every Sunday since launch.  We love Ridge Church!

name: Louellen Stoner
text: For those looking for a church home. This is an awesome place. It is a Bible believing, Bible teaching, and believing in the Trinity Church. Loving family. Chains broken and lives changed. Hope to see you there

name: Daniel Miller
text: Wonderful people spirit filled church.

name: Theresa Reese
text: Can't wait to see you in the church , I love my family in christ.Praying for all.

name: Felicia Roberson
text: I understand the full gospel services may not suit every ones idea of a church service but, the people were warm and welcoming. The signing was wonderful.  The message was on point.  The people we kind, not judgmental and very family oriented.

name: Jackie Lawler
text: Great church and wonderful Preacher Tommy Howze 🙏🙏

name: Lisa Krausz
text: Simply saying you worship Jesus without following his teaching is hypocritical.  You can't just call yourself religious and think somehow that it makes you more holy than others.  There is nothing that you do that represents Jesus.  Where is the love, compassion, understanding, help for the poor and protection of children.  How can you support Roy Moore.  Is he really the best Alabama and your church has to offer.  Shameful.

name: Harold Whatley
text: away from the political side of things has anyone walked into this church to give a review? They are preaching from the bible i have visited twice , and think its a wonderful church , it is small but come as you are church.

name: gprt48
text: Your sign that says "They falsely accused Jesus! - Vote Roy Moore" breaks my heart.  How dare you compare Our Lord to an alleged child molester who has based his career on spreading hatred?  I simply can't understand how people who take such pride in calling themselves Christians can be so narrow-minded.  Even worse, you are teaching your own prejudice and bigotry to the next generation.  Would Jesus forgive Roy Moore?  Absolutely!  Would He vote for him?  I don't think so.

name: Analtha Moroffko
text: It is shameful that you compare Roy Moore to Jesus. It is further shameful that you are essentially telling young girls don’t bother to report sexual abuse because we won’t believe you anyway. What kind of Christians are you? The heathen kind? What will you tell your daughters when they ask, why did you support a sex offender? Shame on you! We are praying for your souls.

name: Brian Thornton
text:
Sirs,
I have to say that your sign in support of Roy Moore is appalling  to say the least.  The accusations aside, this man is NO CHRISTIAN.  He is a self righteous racist homophobic bigot. Comparing this gun toting moron to Christ is equally blasphemous. Jesus may have been falsely accused, but IT WAS PRIESTS AND CLERICS WHO SENTENCED JESUS TO DEATH.
If he was to return today I'm sure that it will be the Evangelicals that nail him right back up on that cross again.

name: Teach Peace
text: Shame on this church for supporting a man like Roy Moore. These are the kinds of churches which give Christians a bad name.

name: Gregg McAlpin
text: A church that publicly supports a child molester. “Fake Christians” will burn in hell. What a pathetic excuse for humans. Separation of Church and State? Eliminate their tax exempt status.

name: Leslie Houston
text: You do not deserve 1 star. I am highly offended that you tagged Jesus as a child molester. Supporting Roy Moore, a known child molester, goes against Christian beliefs and morals. You are frauds and should be ashamed of yourselves.

name: Lisa Floyd
text: Bland music and the comfort and support extended to pedophiles is a bit disturbing

name: Steve Ehrlich
text: Please explain what you mean by falsely accused.

name: Maria Rodriguez
text: Disgusting! Who supports a pedophile in the name of Jesus. This church needs to be shut down, DO NOT TRUST YOU CHILDREN TO ANY ONE IN CHARGE HERE!!

name: Tiffany Kongo
text: I cannot believe that you have that message on your sign. It is beyond repulsive. Shame on you for defending an accused pedophile.

name: Gary Sutton
text: I would not recommend this church the pastor will offer to help those in need then not show up very disappointed a pastor offering help then leaving a man homeless with no food

name: SoutherCharm2
text: This place is a joke! Shame on you pastor and your congregation!!!!! You need your tax exempt pulled!!!  To compare Roy Moore to Jesus is a disgrace.  Damn you to HELL

name: David Stevens
text: Yeah Jesus didn't touch kids but this church supports someone who probably did.

name: John Potosky
text: What Bible are you people reading... ROY MOORE IS A PERVERT....

name: Allison Serpico
text:
Supporters of molesting teen girls
Compare crimes brought on Jesus to accusations of crimes of child molestation

name: Sharon Jackson
text: I hope you know that you have violated your 501c3 by endorsing a candidate.

name: Ilene Rusnak
text: Your sign makes me proud to be an atheist. What is wrong with you people in Alabama? Y’all are very sick people.

name: Captain Thrawn
text: They support a man accused of pedophilia and compare him to Jesus. Enough said.

name: Conor Geary
text: Not even hell would enjoy this miserable place.

name: Larry Baker
text: You are a disgrace!! Your hypocrisy is exactly why so many are turning away from conventional religion!!!!!!! But, you do call your minions a "flock", they do think like sheep!!!!!! This is exactly why people think so lowly of Southerners!!!!!

name: Antonio Johnson
text: A great place to get the gospel

name: Christina G
text: My church family! Love this place so much! Anointed with the love of Christ flowing all throughout this wonderful place of worship; a church on fire for the Lord! And the most friendliest welcoming place to all who enters whether your already a member or just visiting. All is welcome with arms wide open spreading the love of Jesus Christ to everyone!

name: LadyCath1990 CLUS
text: Absolutely love this place & the people are awesome , makes me feel @ home & like I belong there. And the Preacher is awesome as well not only does he preach on Gospel but on Health as well & has a sense of humour.

resp.text: We love your family Cathaleen and are glad you’re a part of ours!!

name: James Glover
text: Wonderful place to praise and worship the Lord and the people there shows you great love like no other I've ever been.

resp.text: James we are so glad you worshipped with us! We hope to see you again!

name: Anna Jungell
text: This is my church. Love the pastors the people the music.  Wonderful place.

name: Lydia Andrews
text: They're welcoming the pastors and faculty are just heart warming and all around great people.

resp.text: Lydia thank you for the great feedback. We hope to see you again Sunday!

name: Cristina Lynon
text: Where one goes and we all go and grow together! Awesome place to become free.

name: Dewayne Pouncey
text: Our church family

name: Keith Albritton
text: My girlfriend Chrissie took me was great

resp.text: Thank you for worshipping with us Keith. We hope to see you back.

name: Magen Coston
text: It's a GREAT place to go and take your children. They have alot of different things to do for teens and children on down to babies....... The Adults have alot of amazing functions to do for them the list goes on....... Just wished they check up on you more and helped more with families who are in really need.

name: alicia fells
text:
*Powerful biblical teaching! *Awesome  worship!
*Multi-cultural!
*Real heartfelt love from parking   lot to the pulpit!
*Never left service without a greater desire to live a life of purity and total surrender!!!

name: LISA PINTO
text: Wonderful church, they really make you feel welcomed.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback Lisa! We hope to see you again!

name: Naturally Nicole
text: Amazing Church! I've been here for almost 4 years and I have loved every single minute.

name: MatZ
text:
Hi, It's Rylan , I used to go here and remember it. I hope for whatever reason we left, you've fixed it.

-Rylan

name: Mario Turi
text: The church is very alive. Very passionate about Christ. Everyone is friendly and welcoming.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback Mario! We hope to see you and your family again if you’re ever in the area.

name: Samuel Lynon
text: The church is a non-denominational Christian church. This is a great atmosphere filled with a diverse group of people.

name: Minister G.
text: Awesome multi-cultural, non-denominational church. If you're looking for a place filled with love, this is the place to be!!

name: A Guided Light
text: Family church with a world wide ministry. GTH is one big family with awesome leaders and amazing partners.

name: Britnay McClain
text: Love this church. Friendly people and awesome pastor

name: Valeria Broom Hamilton
text: The presence of God is everywhere from the parking lot to the back door​  . The Bishop Scott Hannen and Pastor Aneesa has a pure heart for God and  the partners we are feed very well even when they are not there, it's​ Church made simple, my husband and I can't wait until the next time we meet we are so hungry for God.The questions is how hungry are you for God?

name: Ernest Smith
text: That's A Good Church

resp.text: We appreciate your feedback Ernest!

name: Thomas Lane
text: a great worship service with awesome ppl

name: Liz Ds
text: Great church!

resp.text: Thank you Liz for the great feedback! We hope to see you again this week!!

text: Adore this church and what it stands for

resp.text: Thank you Gracie!!

resp.text: Stop by again next time you’re in the area Charles!

name: Brett Chivers
text: Awesome worship!

name: theresa raine
text: Can't be described, only experienced

name: Jessica Cooper
text: The daycare is poorly managed had to take my grandson out

name: Larry McFarland
text: It's a great ministry

name: B C
text: Great worship experience and word!

name: Cherisse Freeman
text: Great service

name: Dareious Maze
text: Great place of worship

name: Tyson brown
text: Amazing really worth going too

name: Raquel Jackson
text: Pastor Damon and Lady Melissa are two of the most amazing people I've met since living here in Birmingham. Their team is awesome and they always are so genuine and loving! God is intentional and He knew exactly what He was doing when He sent me there. Love these people of God to pieces!

resp.text: Thanks Raquel! The feeling is mutual. God knows how to bring the right people together for the right purpose. We are so glad you are with us!

name: Christina James
text: If you are looking to experience authentic love and relationships between believers, something new and refreshing, bible-based teaching, and opportunities to strengthen your faith and yourself as a follower of Christ.... one word: visit. You won't leave the same.  You won't be disappointed!

resp.text: Thanks for your support Christina. We love having you a part of our ministry.

name: Malissa Davis
text: It's such a cool atmosphere! The worship was great and the people are so loving and kind. Not to mention they feed you after service and have a great time for fellowshipping. The word is solid and very practical for your everyday life. So cool - can't wait to go back next Sunday!

name: Bonita Weaver
text: I had a lovely time.  Everyone was so warm and welcoming.  I really enjoyed the message and the sermon by Pastor Damon.  I will definitely be back!

resp.text: Hi Bonita, thanks for taking a moment to share your thoughts. We're happy to know your experience was positive. We enjoyed you as well. We'd love to see you again!

name: Louis Parks
text: Awesome teaching! The Pastor and his wife have a genuine heart for loving and connecting with people.

name: Steven Moore
text: If you want to experience the Love of Jesus you should attend this Church. The teaching is biblically sound and the members exemplify a loving attitude, and excellent place to grow spiritually.

name: jackee bishop
text: Love it

name: Cindy Selent
text:
If you are unsure about your faith, this is the place to go. There is NO agenda other than the gospel. They make things very clear without pushing you into believing what they want you to believe. The pastors are very good about translating the text, breaking it down, and they even explain the history of each book without inserting personal opinion or twisting things to serve their own personal beliefs.

I was very unsure about my faith in God. I was never pushed or pressured. They didnt come at me like a cult trying to assimilate me. Everything happened naturally! It's a bit hard to explain. Just visit a few times and you will see.

name: Todd_Gilliland
text: It is totally lit 👌🏻only problem is the light dimmer is 9% off. 11/10.

name: Tyler Hansen
text: Pastor Joel is my favorite!!!

name: Dan Ibsen
text: Friendly open church family rooted in the word

name: Simpatic Velcu
text:
(Translated by Google) is good

(Original)
is gutt

name: Manuel Cabral
text: Man I love this place.

name: Darkling198
text: This campus has an at home feel I really enjoyed the worship.

name: Rhonda Hale
text: I don't care for it. Feels like big brother watching. Don't like watching a screen.

name: brandy andrews
text: One visit, video preacher, nobody said good morning or hello. Not likely to return

name: Aaron Jenkins
text: Such a great church. Friendly serve team, all things negative you have heard about this church are not true from what I experienced. Felt a lot of love here, will be back!

name: JOE
text: Great

name: Sheila Gorman
text: Great place to hear the word of God.  People are super friendly and inviting.

name: Paul Bender
text: Blessed they opened a campus in Oxford!

name: Heather Grigsby
text: Lifesong Church is an authentic church that has a heart for serving the community! It is a place where everyone can get plugged in. You will immediately feel like family. Come join the team!

name: Joshua Grigsby
text: This church is about two years old, but the building itself is much older. The people here are very friendly and this church is very active. the community.

name: Lorri Thompson
text: Family, love ,acceptance, unbelievable support in hard times and some of the best encouragers I have ever known! Everything someone looks for in a church home! We love our church !!

resp.text: Thank you for the review! We love you guys!

name: LauraBeth Cole
text: The pastors state they want LifeSong to be an “...authentic church.” I can say they are succeeding. My family has been attending for a few months and have been welcomed and encouraged from day one. We are excited to not just “go” to church at LifeSong but, to “be” the church with LifeSong to the surrounding community!

resp.text: Laura Beth, thank you so much for the review! We are blessed to have you and your family with us!

name: Some Person
text: God always shows up and communicates when I’m here.

resp.text: It is awesome when he shows up! Thank you for the review and we can't wait to worship with you again!

name: Kevin Thompson
text: We visited Lifesong Church a few months back.  Lifesong is a small (but growing), family oriented, spirit-filled church.  We were members of a very large local church.  Though we loved our previous church, we were looking for a smaller congregation.  Lifesong was the first church we visited and we did not have to visit anywhere else. We knew from our 1st visit that we had found our home.  Everyone has welcomed us with open arms from our very first visit.  If you are looking for a home church, I HIGHLY recommend visiting Lifesong.  You will not be disappointed.

resp.text: You are Family! We love you guys and happy to have you a part of our church!

name: Barry Gooch
text: My wife and I came to visit in June 2017. From the very first day we felt very welcomed. We left that day and knew we had found our home church. If your looking for a family oriented church, that is spirit filled and have a uplifting experience, you definitely need to give us a visit.

name: Ashton Stapler
text: Lifesong Church is a place where you can become family. It’s more than just a building with 4 walls. It’s a community of believers who love one another and share the love of Jesus with everyone! Their motto is “you’re family now” and it rings true the moment you walk in the door. I don’t know where I would be without my Lifesong Church family!

name: Keith R
text: Wonderful church with loving people

resp.text: Thank you sir! You are family! Thanks for all you have done for Lifesong Church.

name: Mark Grisby
text: Life can be difficult at times ...don't do it alone....especially  when you can have a church family to do life with.

resp.text: Thank you for your review!

name: Jenn Tittle
text: Came as a stranger leave family

name: Laurie Rials
text: Frank Brown International Songwriters' Festival. Great gospel music performance.

name: Rod Montrose
text: Very open and warm staff at the church. They have safe services or you can attend online.

name: Nancy Schrader
text: The Christmas music on 12-3-17 was wonderful.  Beautiful voices, instruments, handbells, and kids.  Was my first visit.  I will be back.

name: Randall Allen
text: Wonderful place for worship, friendly atmosphere outstanding choir, an very excellent ministry.

name: Michael Jinks
text: A wonderful community church. Still conducts traditional church service and great choir and sings real hymns

name: Rob Jones
text: Very welcoming congregation for traveller's!

name: Kelly Castleberry
text: This is not a Catholic Church and shouldn’t advertise as such.

name: Dan Armstrong
text: Great experience with wonderful people.

name: Seth Fuller
text: Small country church that is family based and has a rich history. Definitely a hidden gem in the community. It is no longer Methodist and is simply Pearson Chapel.

name: Dark Rush
text:
This is the church my grandmother, Louise Ann Dark-Saunders and grandfather, Stewart Saunders attended.
My grandfather,an artist, also has art displayed throughout this charming little country church. I have forever fond memories of here.

name: Jorxxdrip
text: Always an awesome worship experience. I feel loved and have felt the same love for over 17 years. God has His hand on and over this church

name: Alletta Shepherd
text: Excellent teachings of The Word brought forth here.

name: Stevon Lewis
text: Great spiritual experience!

name: Raquel T Green
text: Daystar has a community of loving, committed, Christians after God's heart!

name: Suresh Singh
text: Great experience

name: Amy Brown
text: Easter Sunday was my first time ever attending. The praise music & service were such an amazing & uplifting experience!! It was such a blessing to receive & something that I really needed!!

name: Stephen Appleby
text: Great church. Always working on growing as a Christian. Very loving and encouraging yet speaks the truth. You fell loved and acceptance no matter who you are or where you’ve been.  Truly and all nations church. Yay Jesus!

name: Ashlyn Carter
text: From the worship service to the anointed message, this church is truly a house where the spirit of Lord is always present. I started coming here in 2016 when I started school at Alabama. The very first Sunday I started coming here, I knew I didn't want to go anywhere else. The people are awesome, the preachers and ministers are so gifted by Jehovah, and (my favorite part) the congregation is so diverse and welcoming. 90% of the time I am always moved to tears by just simply being able to witness how the Lord works through people. Best church in the state of Alabama, hands down (unless you're praising Jesus, it's ok to have your hands up then).

name: Yosheeda Hyche
text: A Church that love people and love God.

name: ROKK STAR
text: Great church and very godly blessed pastor

name: First Name
text: I was trying out a new church. I didn't feel welcome and I'll I hear in the conversation before and after church was bad things about other churches. Churches that I hear are very good ones.

name: Gloria Moulden
text: Awesome worship service

name: Chinedu Ugorji 4Jesus
text: Come hungry and Jesus will meet you here.

name: Camille Hunter
text: Wonderful church loving and caring atmosphere.

name: Rita Lenae S Bates
text: The fellowship is awesome and the LOVE is REAL!

name: Tim Densmore
text: Love this place. Will always be home.

name: Ella Green-Smith
text: Atmosphere on FIYA

name: Beyond The Altar Ministries
text: My home away from home!

name: Tina Wilson
text: Home church

name: Cynitha Chick
text: Awesome church

name: Montrell Miller
text: Nice be people

name: Chandra O'Bryant
text: Best Church Ever!!!:)

name: JeBraia Williams
text: Love!

name: Howard Bosman
text:
(Translated by Google) Every time I go to daystar I feel at home, my daughters love going to children's ministry, the teachers are loving and share the Bible with them. The music is amazing and the messages are practical and relevant. I feel in the family each person is kind, there are people from Guatemala, Panama, Honduras, Puerto Rico, Mexico and other places. Daystar is my Family in tuscaloosa!

(Original)
Cada vez que voy a daystar me siento en casa, mis hijas les encanta ir al ministerio de niños, las maestras son amorosas y comparte de la biblia con ellas. La música es increíble y los mensajes son prácticos y relevantes. Me siento en la familia cada persona es amables, hay personas de Guatemala, Panamá, Honduras, Puerto Rico, Mexico y de otros lugares. Daystar es mi Familia en tuscaloosa!

name: cristian zavala
text:
(Translated by Google) Wow 😮 I can say many things. But really what we need is to Taste and see what God is good. And it's something I've experienced at Daystar. I have known the Love of God on another level.

(Original)
Wow 😮 puedo decir muchas cosas. Pero realmente lo que necesitamos es Probar y ver qué Dios es bueno. Y es algo de lo que yo he experimentado en Daystar. He conocido el Amor de Dios a otro Nivel.
